post:
Hello !

Some of you were already aware of this promotional price, here come the time to launch it !

We are happy to announce the first recurrent offer on So you Start, on GAME-1 & GAME-2 server on both FR / CA (BHS) datacenter. **It's a 30% off for life !**

You can check the promotion here:
https://www.soyoustart.com/ie/game-servers/

        GAME-1	Intel  I7-4790K	4c/8t 	4GHz /4.4GHz 	16GB DDR3 1333 MHz	  1x120GB   
**€31.00 ex. VAT**
		
	GAME-2	Intel  I7-4790K	4c/8t 	4GHz /4.4GHz 	32GB DDR3 1333 MHz     1x240GB    	
**€38.00 ex. VAT**

Cheers!
